reminder_event.subject: 🕒 Your Event Schedule & Info for Tomorrow!

reminder_event_swipe.subject: 🕒 Matching Phase Has Started!
reminder_event_swipe.body: Hi {{participantFirstName}}, Just a quick heads-up — the Matching Phase for your event in {{city}} - ({{eventDateFormatted}}) has officially started! This means you can now log in and start viewing potential matches. To view your matches, please login into your Meetlocal account. If you have any questions, feel free to reply or reach out to our support team.

reminder_event_end.subject: ⏳ Only 24 Hours Left to Find Your Match!
reminder_event_end.body: Hi {{participantFirstName}}, Just a quick reminder — you have 24 hours left to find your perfect match for the event in {{city}} - ({{eventDateFormatted}}). You still have some open matches waiting. Don’t miss your chance to connect! 💖 Log in to your Meetlocal Dashboard and complete your matches now. If you have any questions, feel free to reply or contact our support team.
